snippet: Tolib Ayombekov, a former warlord who was wanted by the authorities, has given himself up, state media reported Monday.
abstract: Tajikistan says that Tolib Ayombekov, a former warlord who was wanted by the authorities, has given himself up three weeks after nearly 50 people were killed during a military offensive against him and his supporters near the border with Afghanistan.
lead_paragraph: Tolib Ayombekov, a former warlord who was wanted by the authorities, has given himself up, state media reported Monday.
